name: Memory Lane (itch) (ComSha)
description:
Story

❝ Huh, where is everyone? ❞
❝ My home... it's gone. ❞

This game is a story-based textadventure where you can explore the town and discover mysterious places. Collect multiple items and interact with other citizens. There's just one hook... they no longer seem to remember you.

You can reach up to 6 different endings depending on your actions!

Background

I developed this game during an internship. A major update was added an half year later.

Credits

ComSha
Story, Text, Concept, Main Code
Logiker
Support (e.g. Code, Linking, Porting, Directory Art, rudimentary Graphics, etc.)
WilSupport (e.g. Code, Test, Linking, ...)
